name: smart-parking-system
description: Smart Parking System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,OPENCV" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run opencv"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,OPENCV" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run opencv"
scripts.opencv: cd server/opencv_service && (if exist venv\Scripts\python.exe (venv\Scripts\python.exe service.py) else python service.py)
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
